means: 尊敬，给以荣誉( honor的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: They sat in silence, honoring the clan Jordache for a moment.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们默默地坐了一会儿, 对乔达虚家族表示了一番敬意.

sentence.Network_en: Instead of honoring this sacred obligation, America has given the Negro people a bad check.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国没有履行这项神圣的义务, 只是给黑人开了一张空头支票.

sentence.Network_en: He was a good neighbor and well respected for honoring his word.
sentence.Network_cn: 他和邻里的关系处得很好,由于说话算话而很受人尊敬.
